(sacred [holy], lance-ok [lanceok], amphibious [amphibian], recuperation [heal])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, 2 misc
The Aphroi are ichtycentaurs of pure blood. They are marked by their creator with lobster claws on their brows, a sure sign of divine heritage. All Aphroi receive special status in Oceania and many are trained as sacred warriors equipped with lances and coral armor.
